name: Jose Zapatos
text: Or -- sell yourself to managers that will listen. If you are disgruntled, you carry valuable *institutional memory* that is probably worth investigating. Losing these kinds of people actually hurts a company as whatever is not dealt with will self-perpetuate . But if they won't listen to you or recognize your worth -- there may be little reason to stay.
